description:
THIS CONVERSATION IS CLOSED, PLEASE DO NOT VOTE FURTHER

Politics is the mindkiller, but we can't escape doing it. I believe we need solutions that pull sideways, technical solutions that improve the discussion in a way independent of any party's interests.

This conversation I started both to query concrete ideas/perspectives and as a test of Polis. I want to use it with the people I consider my community to decide what are the most useful tools to guide decisions + actions on a group level.

If there's a statement you have a quibble with, do submit the version of it you properly agree with! Subscribe so you can vote for it once it passes moderation.

report: pol.is/report/r6zbvvszhm3mbfpadxyan
